content:
# About Pradeep Kalluri
I’m a Data Engineer with hands-on experience designing, developing, and deploying scalable data pipelines for advanced analytics and AI-driven solutions. Currently working at **NatWest Bank** on cloud data platform modernization.
## Skills
**Programming & Frameworks:** Python (PySpark, Pandas, NumPy), Scala, SQL, Kedro, API Integration
**Data Engineering:** ELT/ETL Pipeline Development, Airflow, Prefect, Data Modeling, Streaming Data Processing
**Cloud Platforms:** AWS (S3, Glue, Lambda, Redshift), Azure (Synapse, Data Factory), GCP (BigQuery, Dataflow)
**Tools:** Databricks, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, dbt, Kafka, Snowflake
## Education
**MBA - Master in Business Administration** (2023-2024)
York St John University, London, United Kingdom
**Bachelor of Internet & Communication Technology** (2020-2023)
Tor Vergata University, Rome, Italy
## Contact
- Email: Pradeepkalluri143@gmail.com
- Phone: +44 7393481689
- Location: London, United Kingdom

content:
# Professional Experience
## Data Engineer — NatWest Bank
**September 2025 – Present | London, UK**
Cloud Data Platform Modernisation
- Designed and implemented scalable ELT pipelines integrating real-time streaming data from Kafka
- Built distributed PySpark processing jobs in Databricks for ML and analytics use cases
- Automated data orchestration using Airflow with dependency tracking
- Developed modular dbt models with automated testing and lineage tracking
**Technologies:** Python, PySpark, SQL, Snowflake, Kafka, Airflow, dbt, AWS, Terraform, Docker
## Data Engineer — Accenture.
**April 2023 – august 2025 | London, UK**
- Architected scalable ELT pipelines integrating trade, market, and reference data
- Built distributed PySpark jobs for portfolio analytics across petabyte-scale datasets
- Automated complex workflows using Airflow
- Deployed containerized environments with Docker and Kubernetes
**Technologies:** Python, PySpark, Snowflake, dbt, Airflow, Databricks, AWS, Kubernetes
## Data Engineer — DPoint Group.
**June 2022 – March 2023 | Barcelona, SPAIN**
- Designed distributed ELT pipelines integrating SAP
- Developed transformation frameworks in dbt/SQLMesh
- Automated data quality validation using Great Expectations
- Implemented CI/CD with GitHub Actions
**Technologies:** Python, PySpark, Snowflake, dbt, Airflow, AWS, Bloomberg API
